articles.title: US Readies China Chip Curbs That Stop Short of Earlier Proposals - Bloomberg
articles.description: The Biden administration is weighing additional curbs on sales of semiconductor equipment and AI memory chips to China that would escalate the US crackdown on Beijing’s tech ambitions but stop short of some stricter measures previously considered, according t…

articles.author: Elisabeth Buchwald, Clare Duffy
articles.title: FTC opens wide-ranging antitrust probe into Microsoft - CNN
articles.description: Microsoft is set to go under the microscope of the nation’s top antitrust watchdog, the Federal Trade Commission, which is launching a sweeping investigation into the tech giant’s practices.
articles.content:

articles.author: Jennifer Ouellette
articles.title: What fossilized dino feces can tell us about their rise to dominance - Ars Technica
articles.description: Scientists studied trace fossils called bromalites to reconstruct critical food webs in late Triassic, early Jurassic.
